page.title: 13HORTICULTURAL SOCIETY
page.content: This society is open to all villagers who wish to attend our monthly meetings. We have talks on flowers, shrubs,roses, dahlias and vegetables of all kinds. We also have film shows and visits out to gardens etc. Once a year we hold our{Flower and {Vegetable Show}which is held in a large marquee on the village playing field. All{exhibitors}aim to win prizes with produce from{their {gardens.}A wide range of goods is on show, including potatoes, peas, beans, tomatoes,onions carrots, flowers, wines, cakes,jams and bread etc. Children are encouraged to enter their handicrafts, paintings etc. Points are given to class winners. The{exhibitors with the most points are presented with a {silver cup} which they keep for one year.
